resources.string: This application uses AI to distinguish between healthy cotton leaves and cotton leaves that show symptoms of the cotton leaf curl disease. History is shown within the application to allow users to maintain records of disease occurence aswell as any notes that they may want to include that would involve how it was dealt with etc.

Cotton Leaf Curl Disease is a severe condition that affects plants in the Malvaceae family, including cotton. Recognizable symptoms include vein swelling, leaf cupping, and a distinct greening of infected leaves.
Immediate removal and destruction of diseased leaves, followed by a thorough inspection of neighbouring plants, is crucial.

Infected plants should be either burned or buried deeply to prevent further spread. Additionally, the use of insecticides is essential to control whiteflies, which can transmit the disease to healthy plants.
This button is used to select the language
Button used to locate the profile settings
Button used to locate the settings page
Button used to locate the results page
Button used to locate the home page
Button used to flip the camera facing
Button used to go to the next scan
Displays the date the photo was taken
Type your report information in here
Confidence Score = A percentage given 1-100 (1 being the worst and 100 being the best)
Diseased or Healthy = The AI will determine whether the leaf is Diseased or Healthy
Useful information will display text relating to the targeted cotton leaf
The next steps provides advice the user can take to mitigate the chances of the leaf becoming diseased in the future

Useful Information:
A healthy cotton leaf is crucial for optimal cotton plant growth and yield"
Next Steps: To maintain a healthy cotton leaf regular field inspections and appropriate environment should be in place
